item.title: Remote Workforce Management
item.description: Remote Workforce Management Mission Drive the community towards remote work through better support geared towards individuals Problem Transitioning to remote work requires high-diligence which is dependant on the individual Remote work environment often isn’t suitable for productivity Management is impossible to overlook on the individual when in remote work environments Solution Provide a one-stop solution for the enterprise and the individual to manage workload for remote work through O2O solutions Offline locations for remote workers and provide workers’ analytics for enterprises Open up opportunities for diverse workforce through global locations
